Starting from cs 1.6, condition zero, sourse and now csgo i have to say that the optimization of this game is the best. It is  very well made. The biggest problem in this game is the community. The game is full of cheaters and toxic people. VAC doesnt seem to work. Also Valve doesnt seem making any effort for improving their anti cheat system and their only worry is making and selling skins. It used to be my favorite game back in the days but now... they cheat even in big tournaments. Dont give a penny to this game cause you will get super irritated and frustrated. Sadly csgo worths to be buried and forgotten.
best game in the world xddddd
